front.title: Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) Domain Name Mapping Extension for Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) Variants

abstract.t: This document describes an extension of Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) domain name mapping for the provisioning and management of Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) Variants. Specified in XML, this mapping extends the EPP domain name mapping to provide additional features required for the provisioning of IDN variants.
